Texts.Chs: 把^orange;一份肥料^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Fertilizer^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 现在你可以创造一些更先进的化学物质，并能使你的作物生长地更好！
Texts.Eng: Now you can create some more advanced chemicals, and grow even better crops!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;肥料^white;是所有植物所渴求的物质。如果你打算要生产一些的话，那么你首先得有一个^orange;生化实验台^reset;。现在我急需^green;一份肥料^reset;，快去制作一份并带回给我，我会给你奖励的。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Fertilizer^white; is essential to produce plants of any real value. To make some, you will first need a ^orange;Bio-Chem Lab^reset;. ^green;I need one barrel of fertilizer^reset; for this project. Bring me some, would you?
